extendedInfo.description: Take, Shop + Share and REDEEM directly from your device thousands of 50% OFF DEALS + FREE LOCAL COUPONS from your favorite businesses advertising in CLIPPER MAGAZINE. CLIPPER MAGAZINE is created and published for 29 states across the U.S.- mailing to homes and trusted to deliver the best LOCAL deals and coupons for the best restaurant, family activities, health & beauty, services (lawn care to car care), and more. We know the great places, because we live here too! You want the local pizza shop, sushi bar, ice cream treatery, dry cleaner, spa, or family fun place in your town? THAT'S CLIPPER MAGAZINE! Our mission is to put instant savings in your pocket. Need an idea where to eat, play, or shop? Wonder if there's a deal or coupon? Check your DOUBLETAKE OFFERS APP and stretch your dollars nearly every time you go out. Traveling or work out of town? This app is perfect since we offer savings in 29 states and over 750 cities with over 50,000 FREE COUPONS + 1000's of 50% OFF DEALS! You trust the restaurants and merchants we feature where you live, shop and play so you can trust the DOUBLETAKE OFFERS APP to recommend great places (with great deals + coupons) as you take a trip or travel to work. Here are a few great features: - SHOP AND BROWSE for deals + coupons with EZ category options - REDEEM with a quick tap + send to iPhone Passbook - VIEW details, directions + business hours - SHARE your favorites with Social Networking option - FOLLOW your favorite businesses by setting mobile alerts - ACCESS your account and login to connect to your deals + coupons - MANAGE your saved certificates - EXTEND your savings online with DoubleTakeOffers.com Note: PLEASE REMEMBER TO ENABLE YOUR GPS States we cover:AL AZ CA  CO CT DC DE FL GA IL KY LA MA MD ME MI NC NJ NY OH OR PA SC TN TX VA WA WI Alabama Arizona California Colorado Connecticut District of Columbia Delaware Florida Georgia Illinois Kentucky Louisiana Massachusetts Maryland Maine Michigan North Carolina New Jersey New York Ohio Pennsylvania South Carolina Tennessee Texas Virginia Washington WisconsinPrimary Markets:Albany Atlanta Austin Baltimore Boston Brooklyn Buffalo Charlotte Chicago Cincinnati Cleveland Columbus Dallas Dayton Denver Detroit Fort Lauderdale Hartford Houston Indianapolis Jacksonville Kansas City Los Angeles Louisville Memphis Miami Milwaukee Minneapolis Nashville New Orleans Northern VA Oakland Orange County Orlando Philadelphia Phoenix Pittsburgh Portland Providence Raleigh-Durham Richmond Sacramento San Antonio San Diego San Francisco San Jose Seattle St. Louis Washington DC Lancaster Harrisburg Manheim Mt. reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: Before the upgrade I used it all the time, but now I can\'t bring my keyboard up to login.
reviews.author: john hedrick

reviews.comment: Update sucks! Never get coupons to load. Loved the OLD coupon clipper. Hate this one! Haven\'t used been able to use since changes.
reviews.author: Kim Wohlfeil

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It asks for my email address but won\'t let me access the keyboard.  Bring the basics back!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola photon hates update
reviews.comment: Please fix soon!! Worked much better before update impossible to use now
reviews.author: nick washburn

reviews.title: What happened?!?!
reviews.comment: I loved this app now all of a sudden it will not let me type anything!  Sad when updates happen then things go wrong.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Caslow

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Used new app once just fine and wanted to try it again. It opens and gives deals for my area but I can\'t select them to review. The old app was perfect. Hate this one.
reviews.author: R Done

reviews.title: Upgrade made it unusable
reviews.comment: I used to be able to easily access the coupons and specific deals. Now, it freezes or if I\'m able to get to the coupons it won\'t let me click on them to open and use them. I\'ll be uninstalling until it returns to normal.
reviews.author: T.S. Wilson

reviews.title: Not a single Orlando coupon
reviews.comment: May be good for other areas
reviews.author: Misty Mount

reviews.title: Does someone check the reviews?
reviews.comment: It was good til somebody decided to change it. Not able to login, create an acct o anything. Uninstall right away. Wonder if someone reads these comments cuz everyone says the same thing and nobody does anything about it. The sister app \"Clipper Cash\" is the same waste of time...
reviews.author: Juan Puerta

reviews.comment: Does not bring up keyboard, can\'t log in or anything.  Didn\'t anyone try this before releasing it? STOOOPID!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont let me type my info
reviews.comment: Why do we need an account now anyways. Dumb.  Delete
reviews.author: Auti Bell

reviews.title: Hate it!
reviews.comment: Change it back to the previous setup!  IF I WANT DOUBLETAKE DEALS I WILL DOWNLOAD THAT APP! STOP COMBINING THEM!
reviews.author: Jennifer Debinski

reviews.title: Doesnt let me log in
reviews.comment: When i tap the the box ti enter my log in info it wont loaf my keyboard to be able to type....why did u mess up what wasn\'t broke
reviews.author: Denise Sellard

reviews.comment: Update sucked!  Return to original
reviews.author: M Snyder

reviews.title: Why did I even bother??
reviews.comment: I wish I didn\'t have to give it even one star. I have never been able to open this app...ever. I always get \"unfortunately coupon clipper has stopped\". Useless and a waste of my time. Uninstalling. Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Deana C

reviews.title: Sucked. Not worth downloading.
reviews.comment: It would never find my location. I tried zip only. City and State. AND then GPS. -_- Fail.
reviews.author: Ashley Franklin

reviews.title: Another deleted app from my phone
reviews.comment: I live in Pasadena. No good coupons I can use at all for my area. Waste my time installing and uninstall it.
reviews.author: Yannie Yeung

reviews.title: Cannot give me accurate info
reviews.comment: Tells me I\'m close to cities I\'m 2 hours from. Will not show me anything even remotely close to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for small towns
reviews.comment: Won\'t even load anything for my city
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No \"Redeem\" Button
reviews.comment: This is missing on my Android app, so I can;t redeem any coupons and I\'m sure that no merchant will accept that. Will uninstall.
reviews.author: Murray Man
